N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 82.19 - Consumers and repair shops

State Regulations
(a) A consumer has a right to inspect his
vehicle before paying for repair work. The inspection must be on the premises
of the repair shop. (b) Nothing in
this Chapter shall be construed as allowing a consumer to remove his car from
the premises of the repair shop before paying the bill. (c) The consumer's right to inspect his
vehicle is independent of the rights of an insurance company to inspect a
vehicle. Notes
